document_data.name: Argus Treader
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Argus Treader''''' was a [[Gontal|Gontese]] merchant ship owned by Captain [[Madwave]] of [[Szant]].
document_data.History: The ''Argus Treader'' was one of the few Gontese ships that didn't belong to the [[Twelvefold]]. It was famous across [[Laerakond]] as the ship that never had lost either crew or cargo.
